title: Baby Carrier
description: two sections, both with black border; smaller top section has a horizontal rectangle of appliqued squares within squares bordered by strips; bottom section has center batik background with appliqued squares and rectangles with appliqued strip border; red, blue, black; dark blue lining
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
